roleset.name: reduce in price
roleset.note: DISCOUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'discount' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from discount.01-v predicate notes)
DISCOUNT-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to discount.01-v. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from discount.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Anheuser-Busch Cos. said it-1 plans *trace*-1 to aggressively discount its major beer brands...

example.name: almost all args
example.text: John discounted the price of his eternal soul from eternal life and unimaginable wealth to one decent night's sleep.
example.arg: the price of his eternal soul
from eternal life and unimaginable wealth

example.name: with extent
example.text: With a 20% discount from ebay, I decided to buy

example.name: with arg 1, 3 and 4
example.text: With the price discount from $50 to $27.98, I decided to buy.

roleset.name: identify as unimportant
roleset.note: DISCOUNT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'discount' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from discount.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: [John's dissertation]-1 was discounted *trace*-1 by everyone who read it as worthless drivel.
